alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Huron; Richland (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 3:42PM EDT until August 12 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Richland County in north central Ohio... Southeastern Huron County in north central Ohio... Northwestern Ashland County in north central Ohio... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 342 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Plymouth, or 15 miles northwest of Mansfield, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Ashland, Shelby, New London, Plymouth, Savannah, Greenwich, Bailey Lakes, Nankin, Nova, Shenandoah and Olivesburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for north central Ohio. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for north central Ohio.
